item.title: Backing up GPG key with YubiKey, Tomb and Cryptosetup
item.description: SECURE ENVIRONMENT Lets make a working folder where we create file, keys, tombs ad so on. Lets call it /home/$USER/TEMP and export as variable export GPGPATH=/home/$USER/TEMP GPG-KEYS MASTERKEY .commandframeholder { position: relative; } .commandframeholder::after { content: ''; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: var(--accent-color) ; opacity: 0.3; position: absolute; border-radius: 5px; top: 0; left: 0; z-index: -1; }   $   gpg --expert --full-generate-key Please select what kind of key you want: (1) RSA and RSA (default) (2) DSA and Elgamal (3) DSA (sign only) (4) RSA (sign only) (7) DSA (set your own capabilities) (8) RSA (set your own capabilities) (9) ECC and ECC (10) ECC (sign only) (11) ECC (set your own capabilities) (13) Existing key (14) Existing key from card Your selection?
